newsitem.title: USA: HSBC Americas to reedem series A pfd at $50/share.
newsitem.headline: HSBC Americas to reedem series A pfd at $50/share.

text.p: HSBC Americas Inc said Friday that on March 31 it will redeem all outstanding shares of its adjustable rate cumulative preferred stock, Series A, at a redemption price of $50.00 per share, plus accrued and unpaid dividends of $.75 per share.

HSBC Americas Inc, the holding company for Buffalo-based Marine Midland Bank, is an indirectly-held, wholly-owned subsidiary of HSBC Holdings Plc, which had offices in 77 countries and assets of $402 billion December 31.
